sourcesContent:
import {useState, useEffect} from 'react'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function ProductDetail() { const [product, setProduct]=useState(null); const {id}=useParams(); useEffect (() => { fetch(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL+'/products/'+id) .then(res=> res.json()) .then(res=>setProduct(res.product)) },[]) return product &&

{product.name}

Product # {product._id}

{product.price}

- +

Status: {product.stock > 0 ? 'In stock': 'Out of Stock'}

Description:

Processor: Intel i5-1235U (3.30 GHz up to 4.40 GHz), 10 Cores & 12MB Cache RAM & Storage: 8GB, 8Gx1, DDR4, 2666MHz Ach & 512GB SSD Display & Graphics: 15.6" FHD WVA AG 120Hz 250 nits Narrow Border & Integrated Graphics

Sold by: Amazon

}
